Mysterious Dye Merchant Jyamis: Hey you, adventurer! Yes, I mean you. Perhaps are you looking for good quality dyes that can be used to dye symbols? I have plenty. The only catch is, if you purchase one, it will be randomly chosen from my selection. I have plain dyes and rare dyes, but I can guarantee that it will be of high quality. What do you say? [npc_%objectId%_Multisell 719|It sounds worth a try.]
